items.sentence: Tom\'s house is within walking distance of the nearest train station.
Tom carved his initials on the large oak tree in front of the school.

My wife and I hope to get away for a week during the Christmas break.
If I remember correctly, Tom and Mary got married in October of 2003.
It took slightly more than five minutes for Tom to read the pamphlet.
Tom is in a coma and the doctors are not sure if he\'s going to live.
